attributes.action: Compulsory Motorcycle Training for Car Drivers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In an effort to reduce accidents and fatalities please make it compulsory for all potential car drivers to complete the current Motorcycle test and have some roadgoing motorcycle experience before being allowed to progress to a car licence.
Two fold benefits are:
1/ Reduction in accidents as all car drivers will have some tacit knowledge of how quickly a motorcycle can or cannot stop when pulled out in front of.
2/ Some potential car drivers may discover the benefits of motorcycling and continue to use the more eco friendly machine reducing congestion and pollution.
